Content: **Tempress Fortnite Clan**NLTeam Tempress is a console clan who competes in Fortnite. NLNL**We are recruiting for the following postions:**NLPlayer - A general clan player (our average player has 230 wins and 1.8 seasonal kd: don't worry if your stats don't compare_ we have some very good players!)NLEditor - Someone who can edit team and individual montagesNLGFX Designer - Someone who can create artwork such as social media material and video thumbnailsNLNL**Requirements:**NL- At least 12 years oldNL- Play EU servers and speak good EnglishNL- Play using a controller on consoleNL- Not toxicNL- Have a micNL- Can send clips that are at least 720pNLNLDM me to sign up!
